sections.MISSION: 1st SQDN, 2CR conducts annual mask confidence qualification on 20JUN24, at the GTA CS Chamber IOT fulfill annual training requirements and verify the fit of SM’s individually assigned Pro Masks.
sections.PURPOSE: – Train War Eagles with CBRN equipment to increase proficiency IAW annual training requirements.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct mask confidence qualification to build familiarity with equipment
Conduct JSLIST donning and doffing within required time
Retrain SMs that fail to complete the exercise
Task to Subordinate Units
A TRP
Provide 1x CBRN NCO
B TRP
Provide 1x CBRN NCO
D FST
Provide 1x CBRN NCO
HHT
Provide 1x Range OIC and 1x Range RSO
Provide 1x Hot Plate / Sterno
Infared Thermometer
Provide 30x JSLIST
Provide 1x Water Buffalo
Provide 1x JLTV w/ Litter and CLS Bag
Provide 60x RSDL packets
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
HHT will provide 30x JSLIST to conduct donning and doffing training
Ensure SMs DO NOT wear contacts day of training
Ensure SMs bring ProMask glasses inserts day of training
POCs
Primary: 2LT Emily Anikin/ OIC

Medical Coverage Plan
